name: Gate VI — Dimkur Ka Gi-Dub
description: The sixth threshold of Inanna’s descent. The Gate of the Measuring Rod and Line, where the sovereign relinquishes the power to define, measure, and judge reality. Here, structure dissolves and identity loosens as the final architecture of control falls into the Great Below. This plate is part of the Measures of Inanna — Obsidian Gates Series.

attributes.value: The Gate of the Measuring Rod and Line
